properties.areaDesc: Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains above 11000 Ft
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 9 at 3:46AM MST until February 10 at 6:00AM MST by NWS Pueblo CO
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 10
inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph.

* WHERE...Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains Above 11000 Feet.

* WHEN...From 11 AM this morning to 6 AM MST Monday.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing
snow could significantly reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO 6 AM MST MONDAY
